biotools.summary: Interactive multi-resolution docking and visualization program for low-resolution density maps and atomic structures. GUI-based extension of the Situs docking programs, to allow an interactive exploration and analysis of volumetric maps. Combines 3D rendering with advanced mathematical concepts like clustering techniques and pattern matching algorithms to permit an almost instantaneous fitting of the high-resolution structures.
